author: Hele Bee
comment: I can't get the thing to work. I downloaded it on my phone and my watch, and when trying to configure it on the phone, it says "Low Internet Connection". I tried to "reload" and I still get the same error. This is when both devices are connected to the same wi-fi that is not "low". The watchface is set to the default location set by the developer and is thus useless for knowing the weather for my area.  This is the second watchface that I have had problems with from this developer.

author: Robert Barclay
comment: At last today I have been able to download this again after a few attempts in the past week or so. And today it finally installed on my watch and I am very pleased with this watch face. I would like to apologise to the developer for my initial negative review.

reply.author: Frillroid Watch Faces
reply.content: We have recently pushed an updated and have removed all the reported bugs. Can you please update your app and let us know your valuable feedback?

title: I really like this.

author: benjamin guzman
comment: Loving the design so far,  wish you could mix notifications.  (Phone battery and watch battery etc)
title: Looks great

author: David Richards
comment: Won't work on My Moto G 2nd, refund did work either. Keeps crashing. 😬

author: Damith Abeysekera
comment: Currently working on my Moto 360 with companion Nexus 6P. Hoping it stays that way. :)

author: Ram Ram
comment: Still not working with Samsung gear 2 , send to wear nothing happens,  is there any solution for that
title: Not working with gear 2

author: Josh Woolard
comment: I really wanted to use this, but not only will it not show up in android wear, but when I try to send it to my watch, it does nothing.  Will change rating if a solution is offered, or if the app is fixed.  The update did not fix the issue.  ***update* I still don't see the app on my phone, and it still won't send to my phone.  I sent an email, and still haven't received a reply, after 3 days.  My review will remain a 1 star.  And I'm glad I could contribute to your bank account. ***

reply.author: Frillroid Watch Faces
reply.content: We have recently pushed an updated and have removed all the reported bugs. Can you please update your app and let us know your valuable feedback?

title: Looks nice on my phone.

author: mike mcclain
comment: Downloaded last week and kept getting error messages when trying to open.. Tried to download again and STILL getting errors and can't get refund. Not happy
title: Won't open

author: Usman JamMil
comment: Is there any way you can change your watch color by changing mood/day-night/weather for example watch turns dark in night? But yeah this watch face is different than the others,but I like it
title: Changing colors with changing mood :)

author: Keefer Tech
comment: This is NOT for the gear 1 or 2. Only wear watches.

reply.author: Frillroid Watch Faces
reply.content: We have recently pushed an updated and have removed all the reported bugs. Can you please update your app and let us know your valuable feedback?

title: Not for Gear 1 or 2

author: Dale W
comment: App caused my phone and gear live to constantly restart. How?! I would change the location from Islamabad toy current location 3 or 4 times a day. 1 star is very very courteous...
title: Horrible

author: Ryan Joseph
comment: I like the design of this watch a lot, but it's really buggy with weather updates. The current location was just HTML error text, and when in ambient mode, the info doesn't update at all. Also, there's no settings for ambient mode. So if the wallpaper is active, it shows the full image even in ambient. This makes it hard to read on most watches, and eats battery on the round LG watches. It needs an option for wallpaper in active mode, black background in ambient.
title: Great design, needs work

author: Sinthia Turcios
comment: Weather doesn't work on the ASUS watch and the app glitches once I try putting it on my watch, it doesn't let me change the background either.

author: Andrew Velez
comment: not for gear live. yet you say compatible with all devices.

author: Jene Adelam
comment: Weather takes little time to load, but overall design is fabulous and neat
title: Sleek
